dcterms:description: The ACE 2005 dataset is widely used for event extraction tasks, containing 599 documents annotated with 8 coarse-grained event types, 33 event subtypes, and 36 argument roles. It includes a complete set of training data in English, Arabic, and Chinese for the ACE 2005 technology evaluation.
dcterms:title: ACE 2005
